languages.text: "Не спешите со смертными приговорами. Действуйте сдержанно и с умом, предоставляя другим необходимые доказательства вины того или иного дома. Конечно, массовые казни — тоже способ решения проблем, но в таком случае вам лучше просчитать все ходы наперед".

traits.locale_text: "Не спешите со смертными приговорами. Действуйте сдержанно и с умом, предоставляя другим необходимые доказательства вины того или иного дома. Конечно, массовые казни — тоже способ решения проблем, но в таком случае вам лучше просчитать все ходы наперед".

languages.text: "I would hold off on the death sentences. Act with restraint and wisdom, present for all to see sufficient proof of the unwanted house's guilt. Do not mistake me — mass executions are one way to solve your problems — but in that case, you should weigh up every possible scenario before you act."
languages.original_text: "Не спешите со смертными приговорами. Действуйте сдержанно и с умом, предоставляя другим необходимые доказательства вины того или иного дома. Конечно, массовые казни — тоже способ решения проблем, но в таком случае вам лучше просчитать все ходы наперед".

traits.locale_text: "I would hold off on the death sentences. Act with restraint and wisdom, present for all to see the sufficient proof of the unwanted house's guilt. Don't get me wrong, mass executions are one way to solve one's problems, but in that case you should consider every possible scenario ahead of time."

"I would hold off on the death sentences. Act with restraint and wisdom, present for all to see the sufficient proof of the unwanted house's guilt. Don't get me wrong, mass executions are one way to solve one's problems, but in that case you should consider every possible scenario ahead of time."

"I would hold off on the death sentences. Act with restraint and wisdom, present for all to see sufficient proof of the unwanted house's guilt. Do not mistake me — mass executions are one way to solve your problems — but in that case, you should weigh up every possible scenario before you act."

"I would hold off on the death sentences. Act with restraint and wisdom, present for all to see sufficient proof of the unwanted house's guilt. Do not mistake me — mass executions are one way to solve your problems — but in that case, you should weigh up every possible scenario before you act."

"I would hold off on the death sentences. Act with restraint and wisdom, present for all to see sufficient proof of the unwanted house's guilt. Do not mistake me — mass executions are one way to solve your problems — but in that case, you should weigh up every possible scenario before you act."

languages.text: “如果换做是我，我不会处决他们。我会以更加克制、更加明智的方式行事。如果想消灭那些不受欢迎的家族，我会让所有人看到他们有罪的充分证据。请不要误会我的意思，您确实可以靠大规模处决来解决问题，但在动手之前，您应当思考所有可能带来的结果。”
languages.original_text: "I would hold off on the death sentences. Act with restraint and wisdom, present for all to see sufficient proof of the unwanted house's guilt. Do not mistake me — mass executions are one way to solve your problems — but in that case, you should weigh up every possible scenario before you act."

traits.locale_text: “如果换做是我，我不会处决他们。我会以更加克制、更加明智的方式行事。如果想消灭那些不受欢迎的家族，我会让所有人看到他们有罪的充分证据。请不要误会我的意思，您确实可以靠大规模处决来解决问题，但在动手之前，您应当思考所有可能带来的结果。”

languages.text: «De momento, evitaría recurrir a las sentencias de muerte. Actúe con contención y sabiduría, de forma que la culpa de la casa indeseable quede a la vista de todo el mundo. No me malinterprete, las ejecuciones en masa son una solución viable a sus problemas, pero en este caso le recomiendo que evalúe todas las posibilidades antes de actuar».
languages.original_text: "I would hold off on the death sentences. Act with restraint and wisdom, present for all to see sufficient proof of the unwanted house's guilt. Do not mistake me — mass executions are one way to solve your problems — but in that case, you should weigh up every possible scenario before you act."

traits.locale_text: «De momento, evitaría recurrir a las sentencias de muerte. Actúe con contención y sabiduría, de forma que la culpa de la casa indeseable quede a la vista de todo el mundo. No me malinterprete, las ejecuciones en masa son una solución viable a sus problemas, pero en este caso le recomiendo que evalúe todas las posibilidades antes de actuar».

languages.text: 「死刑判決は避けるつもりです。節度と知性を持って行動し、不要な貴族家が有罪である十分な証拠を万人に示しましょう。誤解なさらないでください。大量処刑は問題解決のひとつの方法です。しかし今回については、行動を起こす前にあらゆる起こりうるシナリオを評価しておくべきかと」
languages.original_text: "I would hold off on the death sentences. Act with restraint and wisdom, present for all to see sufficient proof of the unwanted house's guilt. Do not mistake me — mass executions are one way to solve your problems — but in that case, you should weigh up every possible scenario before you act."

traits.locale_text: 「死刑判決は避けるつもりです。節度と知性を持って行動し、不要な貴族家が有罪である十分な証拠を万人に示しましょう。誤解なさらないでください。大量処刑は問題解決のひとつの方法です。しかし今回については、行動を起こす前にあらゆる起こりうるシナリオを評価しておくべきかと」

languages.text: "Ich würde mit den Todesstrafen noch abwarten. Handelt zurückhaltend und weise und zeigt allen ausreichende Beweise für die Schuld des unerwünschten Hauses. Versteht mich nicht falsch, Massenhinrichtungen würden Eure Probleme durchaus lösen – aber in diesem Fall solltet Ihr sämtliche möglichen Szenarien erwägen, bevor Ihr handelt."
languages.original_text: "I would hold off on the death sentences. Act with restraint and wisdom, present for all to see sufficient proof of the unwanted house's guilt. Do not mistake me — mass executions are one way to solve your problems — but in that case, you should weigh up every possible scenario before you act."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde mit den Todesstrafen noch abwarten. Handelt zurückhaltend und weise und zeigt allen ausreichende Beweise für die Schuld des unerwünschten Hauses. Versteht mich nicht falsch, Massenhinrichtungen würden Eure Probleme durchaus lösen – aber in diesem Fall solltet Ihr sämtliche möglichen Szenarien erwägen, bevor Ihr handelt."

languages.text: « Si j'étais vous, j'attendrais avant de condamner qui que ce soit à mort. Faites preuve de retenue et de sagesse. Présentez plutôt au moment opportun la preuve irréfutable de la culpabilité d'une maison indésirable. Ne vous méprenez pas, les exécutions de masse ont effectivement leur mérite. Mais avant de vous y risquer, vous devriez envisager chaque scénario imaginable. »
languages.original_text: "I would hold off on the death sentences. Act with restraint and wisdom, present for all to see sufficient proof of the unwanted house's guilt. Do not mistake me — mass executions are one way to solve your problems — but in that case, you should weigh up every possible scenario before you act."

traits.locale_text: « Si j'étais vous, j'attendrais avant de condamner qui que ce soit à mort. Faites preuve de retenue et de sagesse. Présentez plutôt au moment opportun la preuve irréfutable de la culpabilité d'une maison indésirable. Ne vous méprenez pas, les exécutions de masse ont effectivement leur mérite. Mais avant de vous y risquer, vous devriez envisager chaque scénario imaginable. »

languages.text: "İdam emri vermekte o kadar acele etmezdim. Kendinizi zapt edip sağduyuyla hareket edin, istenmeyen bir hanenin suçlarını herkesin görebileceği şekilde sergileyin. Beni yanlış anlamayın, toplu infazlar da sorunlarınıza çözüm yolu olabilir ancak mevcut durum içerisinde, harekete geçmeden önce her türlü senaryoyu ölçüp tartmalısınız."
languages.original_text: "I would hold off on the death sentences. Act with restraint and wisdom, present for all to see sufficient proof of the unwanted house's guilt. Do not mistake me — mass executions are one way to solve your problems — but in that case, you should weigh up every possible scenario before you act."

traits.locale_text: "İdam emirlerini vermekte o kadar acele etmezdim. Kendinizi zaptederek, sağduyuyla hareket edin, istenmeyen bir hanenin suçlarını herkesin görebileceği şekilde sergileyin. Beni yanlış anlamayın, toplu infazlar da sorunlarınızı çözmenin bir yoludur ancak mevcut durum içerisinde harekete geçmeden önce her türlü senaryoyu ölçüp tartmalısınız."
